oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sterling silver pin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sterling silver pin, circular with flowers, and engraved with "J. L. B." The medallion, fashioned into a pin by the donor, was originally the lid to a glass cosmetics jar. It belonged to a member of the Bennett family.; The clasp on the rear of the pin most likely indicates that it was fashioned into jewelry post Civil War.
